Subroutine vom_subhourly_init

1060 : 
1061 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1062 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1063 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1064 : !*----- setting variables from previous loop----------------------------
1065 : 
1066 :       subroutine vom_subhourly_init ()
1067 :       use vegwatmod
1068 :       use vegmod
1069 :       use watmod
1070 :       implicit none
1071 : 
1072 : !!$      if (nlayersnew .ge. 1) then
1073 : !!$        if (nlayers_ .ge. 1) then         ! Need to account for the change in rsurf due to a change in unsaturated soil volume.
1074 : !!$          rsurfvec(1:nlayersnew) = rsurfvec(1:nlayersnew)            &
1075 : !!$     &                           / (omgu_ * delzvec(1:nlayersnew))   &
1076 : !!$     &                           * omgunew * delznewvec(1:nlayersnew)
1077 : !!$          rsurfg_(1:nlayersnew) = rsurfg_(1:nlayersnew) / (omgu_     &
1078 : !!$     &                          * delzvec(1:nlayersnew)) * omgunew   &
1079 : !!$     &                          * delznewvec(1:nlayersnew)
1080 : !!$        else                              ! If nlayers at the previous time step was 0, rsurf was set to rsurfmin.
1081 : !!$          rsurfvec(1:nlayersnew) = rsurfvec(1:nlayersnew) * omgunew  &
1082 : !!$     &                           * delzvec(1:nlayersnew)
1083 : !!$          rsurfg_(1:nlayersnew) = rsurfg_(1:nlayersnew) * omgunew    &
1084 : !!$     &                          * delzvec(1:nlayersnew)
1085 : !!$        endif
1086 : !!$      endif
1087 : 
1088 :       if (nlayersnew .lt. pos_) then
1089 :         rsurfvec(nlayersnew+1:pos_) = rsurfmin * delz_
1090 :       endif
1091 :       if (nlayersnew .lt. posg) then
1092 :         rsurfg_(nlayersnew+1:posg) = rsurfmin * delz_
1093 :       endif
1094 : 
1095 :       mq_          = mqnew
1096 :       ys_          = ysnew
1097 :       suvec_(:)    = sunewvec(:)
1098 : !      yu__         = yunew_
1099 :       nlayers_     = nlayersnew
1100 :       suvec_(:)    = sunewvec(:)
1101 :       pcapvec(:)   = pcapnewvec(:)
1102 :       kunsatvec(:) = kunsatnewvec(:)
1103 : 
1104 :       return
1105 :       end subroutine vom_subhourly_init
